body:
Because it's (nearly) Christmas, I thought it would be appropriate to share Christmas songs. If you have a Christmas song you love, post it down below. One song I'm rather fond of is "Once upon a Christmas song" : https://youtu.be/Ld-HVQNxv8c. One last thing, no inappropriate songs such as racist ones.

Merry Christmas =}
body_tagged:
